pr_title: Quickstarts shouldn't part of the distribution zip yet

timeline.message: Quickstarts shouldn't part of the distribution zip yet

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to keep the commented-out assembly together will all the exclusions?
timeline.author: rsynek
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -64,31 +64,32 @@
       </excludes>
     </fileSet>
     <!-- Quickstart -->
-    <fileSet><!-- Note: going outside the module dir is bad, but it is not fetching generated files -->
-      <directory>../optaplanner-quickstarts</directory>
-      <outputDirectory>quickstarts</outputDirectory>
-      <excludes>
-        <exclude>pom.xml</exclude>
+<!--    <fileSet><!– Note: going outside the module dir is bad, but it is not fetching generated files –>-->

replies.bodyText: We decided that the zip requires the binaries of the quickstarts, but not the sources. So no, you're right. I'll remove this.
replies.author: ge0ffrey

timeline.message: Quickstarts shouldn't part of the distribution zip yet: sources will never be
